column5: Here is my Winter protection.           Oh and my hut comes with this Mascot he puts on your minnows and cleans all the fish

I made a couple of wind shelters a few years ago and they worked quite well...     Only problem was that I used 3/4 inch plywood (too heavy to pull in the snow)...Should of used 1/4 inch and should of used aluminum toboggans instead of skis on the bottom as they dig into the snow where tobaggans ride on top...  Riley used to love to run around on the ice then curl up on his blanket inside the shelter...  Today they do duty as shelving units out in the fishing area of my garage     The tarps are now used to cover my wood pile...

Hey all figured since we are often in the same areas as eachother fishing especially on the Ice it'd  be a neat way to meet each other, unexpectedly. So for those interested post a pic of your Hut or your Quad/sled or vehicle if you bring it on the ice on  here so we can identify each other on the Ice.  Here's mine It has an OFC Sticker on the front door so ya know for sure its me, If ya see it come on by and say hi...
Hi ya Bill. I wear my hut,yep, Nautalus pro 2000. But I will tell ya, I dont mind being in doors when the wind picks up. I have made many of those that you have there. Nice looking porty bud.
anyone on the board is more then welcome to stop by. just look for the sled parked beside it  Dann
well my hut is blue and looks like about 1000 others out there on the weekend but my ride might be noticed
Do you leave the keys in it Dann   LOL
Mine is a 8X10 sleeper hut - I like to be warm and comfy I also have a fish trap guide for day trips.   Don
Bill I dont thknk you will miss us,We are the guys that take every thing but the kitchen sink.But we take it all home when we leave. Dan
lol----NOT
The hut and the rides mines the beater 1976 tnt440 reee ree bang chug ree ...........gone!
Clam 6800 6x8
mine is just like dans !!!!...its an amazing hut too,does the job real well....cheers
I've got a green eskimo quick flip 2.....behind an arctic cat puma 2 up.  I'm the tall guy in the red/black floater with all the fish piled up  Sinker
Nice set-up Tracker, even the dog looks comfortable! Here's mine..
Dang...that reminds me...gotta get to work on my "Jed shelter" that I wanna mount to the side of my sleds cutter
Ok, .. so what exactly is the "Jed Shelter"?
quote name='Clamp-It' date='Jan 20 2008, 03:55 PM' post='152518'] Ok, .. so what exactly is the "Jed Shelter"?          Think this is a JED SHELTER   Don

But I do indeed wanna do a small one with the pole holders mounted to the side of my cutter. Pull up.. drill holes...position sled and cutter on windward side and set up the Jed shelter. My back took a cold beating last year sitting on the sled seat with back to the wind.
Nice hut Trapper.
Thanks - I call it my winter weekend cottage. It sleeps 3 quite comfortably and the top bunk folds up for daytime fishing.   Don
That's the great thing about permanent huts there a home away from home up "on" the lake.Here's my hut all 6x4 of her.
Nice hut Iceguy - do you put it out on simcoe?   Don

hey Iceguy  did you happen to pick that up this year? Im pretty sure its my buddies old hut he sold on ebay.  if it is its a sweet little hut.     I have a fish trap guide for the walking days and a Voyager for the pulling days. Cant beat the Clam!
Ya I picked it up off a guy in Barrie, Really happy with it. Will be out for Simcoe whitey's by the end of the week hopefully.
see what you started bill--lol nice to see every one posting   Dann
here's my new hut,,,,just need ice!!  http://www.fish307.com/productimages/shappell/RV2D_pi_lg.jpg
